Don\'t have an account? Use Sign Up

Mahima Electronics is an ISO 9001:2008 Certified Company.The foundation stone of the company was laid in the year 2003. At present, we are acknowledged as a pioneer among the leading Manufacturers, Exporters, Importers \u0026 Suppliers of the Industrial Products. Mr. K. C. Chawla, proprietor of the company possesses more than 20 years of experience and has degrees of B.Sc. and M.B.A. We facilitate our clients from our base in Haryana, India.

We have earned a credible name owing to out ethical business approach and wide industrial experience. We are capable to understanding every minute requirement of our clients and thus, providing them products that match their exact requirements.

We have a well-developed manufacturing unit that includes state of the art inventory. It enables us to meet the deadlines of even short notice bulk orders. We adopt low production costs techniques in the manufacturing process.

With products that are at par with the highest industrial standards and a customer centric approach in all the dealings, we have gained the trust of many eminent clients. Renowned Private and Government firms as well as the companies engaged in defense sector procure our products.
